name: Space Cardet 1.1
description:
Press F to full screen

Press M to mute sound

Simply throw cards up to play them. Try to collect all the waypoints in the shortest time in Time Attack Mode, or see how many you can collect before time runs out in Survival Mode. This project was made for the GMTK Jam 2020. Much thanks to the various artists who made many of the assets I used to produce this game <3.

Unfortunately, Survival Mode is bugged. At a certain point, it keeps spawning waypoints in the same place over and over :P... Time Attack is where it's at...

Parallax Background https://ansimuz.itch.io/
